input.sentences: the family dog lies on the ground .
here is a very old photo of my family .
here are the toys from finding nemo i have collected .
here is the psp i got for christmas .
here is my favorite drink of all time | dr. pepper .
output.sentences: The dog was lying on the ground waiting for his family to leave the house.
They were a big family so it always took time for them to get ready.
There were many children so they always had lots of toys to collect.
Since they were going to be traveling in the car they had to make sure electronic games were packed.
They had their toys, electronics, and their drinks, like Dr. Pepper, ready to go.
